price: 54 Abraham dit : « Vous vous êtes, vous et vos ancêtres, manifestement égarés. »
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
